trans-unit.source: Represents the control that displays a header that has a collapsible window that displays content.
trans-unit.target: 代表顯示標題具有可顯示內容的摺疊視窗的控制項。

trans-unit.source: Expander is a <xref:System.Windows.Controls.HeaderedContentControl>, which means its <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ContentControl.Content%2A> and <xref:System.Windows.Controls.HeaderedContentControl.Header%2A> properties can be of any type (such as string, image, or panel).
trans-unit.target: Expander 是<xref:System.Windows.Controls.HeaderedContentControl>，這表示其<xref:System.Windows.Controls.ContentControl.Content%2A>和<xref:System.Windows.Controls.HeaderedContentControl.Header%2A>屬性可以是任何類型 （例如字串、 影像或面板）。</xref:System.Windows.Controls.HeaderedContentControl.Header%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.ContentControl.Content%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.HeaderedContentControl>

trans-unit.source: For more information, see the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.HeaderedContentControl> class.
trans-unit.target: 如需詳細資訊，請參閱<xref:System.Windows.Controls.HeaderedContentControl>類別。</xref:System.Windows.Controls.HeaderedContentControl>

trans-unit.source: The following illustration shows an Expander control.
trans-unit.target: 下圖顯示展開器控制項。

trans-unit.source: ![Expander example](~/add/media/expanderexample.JPG "Expander example") If the content of the expanded window is too large for the window, you can wrap the content of the Expander in a <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ScrollViewer> control to provide scrollable content.
trans-unit.target: ![Expander 範例](~/add/media/expanderexample.JPG "Expander 範例")如果展開視窗的內容太大的視窗，您可以包裝在 Expander 內容<xref:System.Windows.Controls.ScrollViewer>控制項提供可捲動內容。</xref:System.Windows.Controls.ScrollViewer>

trans-unit.source: Scrolling capability is not automatically provided by the Expander control.
trans-unit.target: 捲動功能未自動提供 Expander 控制項。

trans-unit.source: For an Expander to work correctly, do not specify a <xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement.Height%2A> on the Expander control when the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Expander.ExpandDirection%2A> property is set to <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ExpandDirection> or <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ExpandDirection>.
trans-unit.target: 正常運作的 Expander，如未指定<xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement.Height%2A>上 Expander 控制項時的<xref:System.Windows.Controls.Expander.ExpandDirection%2A>屬性設定為<xref:System.Windows.Controls.ExpandDirection>或<xref:System.Windows.Controls.ExpandDirection>.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.ExpandDirection> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.ExpandDirection> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.Expander.ExpandDirection%2A> </xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement.Height%2A>

trans-unit.source: Similarly, do not specify a <xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement.Width%2A> on the Expander control when the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Expander.ExpandDirection%2A> property is set to <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ExpandDirection> or <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ExpandDirection>.
trans-unit.target: 同樣地，未指定<xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement.Width%2A>上 Expander 控制項時的<xref:System.Windows.Controls.Expander.ExpandDirection%2A>屬性設定為<xref:System.Windows.Controls.ExpandDirection>或<xref:System.Windows.Controls.ExpandDirection>.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.ExpandDirection> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.ExpandDirection> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.Expander.ExpandDirection%2A> </xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement.Width%2A>

trans-unit.source: When you set a size on the Expander control in the direction that the expanded content is displayed, the area that is defined by the size parameter is displayed with a border around it.
trans-unit.target: 當您將大小設定 Expander 控制項的方向上會顯示展開的內容時，大小參數所定義的區域會顯示與邊框。

trans-unit.source: This area displays even when the window is collapsed.
trans-unit.target: 這個區域會顯示即使已摺疊視窗。

trans-unit.source: To set the size of the expanded window, set size dimensions on the content of the Expander control or the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ScrollViewer> that encloses the content.
trans-unit.target: 若要設定展開視窗的大小，請設定 Expander 控制項的內容大小的維度或<xref:System.Windows.Controls.ScrollViewer>圍住內容。</xref:System.Windows.Controls.ScrollViewer>

trans-unit.source: When an Expander control is the last element in a <xref:System.Windows.Controls.DockPanel>, the Expander is sized to fill the remaining area of the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.DockPanel>.
trans-unit.target: Expander 控制項時<xref:System.Windows.Controls.DockPanel>，展開器，就會調整大小以填滿剩餘的<xref:System.Windows.Controls.DockPanel>。</xref:System.Windows.Controls.DockPanel>區域</xref:System.Windows.Controls.DockPanel>的最後一個元素

trans-unit.source: To prevent this, set the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.DockPanel.LastChildFill%2A> property on the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.DockPanel> to `false`, or make sure that the Expander is not the last element in a <xref:System.Windows.Controls.DockPanel>.
trans-unit.target: 若要避免這個問題，設定<xref:System.Windows.Controls.DockPanel.LastChildFill%2A>屬性<xref:System.Windows.Controls.DockPanel>至`false`，或請確定 Expander 不是最後一個元素<xref:System.Windows.Controls.DockPanel>.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.DockPanel> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.DockPanel> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.DockPanel.LastChildFill%2A>

trans-unit.source: The alignment of Expander content can be defined by setting the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Control.HorizontalContentAlignment%2A> and <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Control.VerticalContentAlignment%2A> properties on the control.
trans-unit.target: 可以定義 Expander 內容的對齊方式，藉由設定<xref:System.Windows.Controls.Control.HorizontalContentAlignment%2A>和<xref:System.Windows.Controls.Control.VerticalContentAlignment%2A>控制項的屬性。</xref:System.Windows.Controls.Control.VerticalContentAlignment%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.Control.HorizontalContentAlignment%2A>

trans-unit.source: These properties are applied to the header and to the contents of the expanded window.
trans-unit.target: 這些屬性會套用至標頭及展開視窗的內容。

trans-unit.source: Customizing the Expander Control To apply the same property settings to multiple Expander controls, use the <xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement.Style%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: Expander 控制項以自訂適用於多個 Expander 控制項，使用相同的屬性設定<xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement.Style%2A>屬性。</xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement.Style%2A>

trans-unit.source: You can modify the default <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ControlTemplate> to give the control a unique appearance.
trans-unit.target: 您可以修改預設<xref:System.Windows.Controls.ControlTemplate>來提供獨特的外觀的控制項。</xref:System.Windows.Controls.ControlTemplate>

trans-unit.source: For more information about creating a <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ControlTemplate>, see [Customizing the Appearance of an Existing Control by Creating a ControlTemplate](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: 如需有關建立<xref:System.Windows.Controls.ControlTemplate>，請參閱[自訂現有控制項的外觀，藉由建立 ControlTemplate](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)。</xref:System.Windows.Controls.ControlTemplate>

trans-unit.source: To see the parts and states that are specific to the Expander, see [Expander Styles and Templates](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: 若要查看的組件和特定擴充項的狀態，請參閱[Expander 樣式和範本](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)。

trans-unit.source: Dependency properties for this control might be set by the control’s default style.
trans-unit.target: 對這個控制項的相依性屬性可能會設定控制項的預設樣式。

trans-unit.source: If a property is set by a default style, the property might change from its default value when the control appears in the application.
trans-unit.target: 如果屬性設定為預設樣式，屬性可能會變更其預設值時該控制項會出現在應用程式中。

trans-unit.source: The default style is determined by which desktop theme is used when the application is running.
trans-unit.target: 預設樣式是由決定由哪個桌面主題時，會使用應用程式正在執行。

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [Default WPF Themes](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=158252).
trans-unit.target: 如需詳細資訊，請參閱[預設 WPF 佈景主題](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=158252)。

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > Setting a visual property will only have an effect if that property is both present in Expander control's default template and is set by using a .
trans-unit.target: > [!NOTE] > 設定視覺化屬性只會影響如果該屬性會出現在 Expander 控制項的預設範本，並使用設定的。

trans-unit.source: You can find a list of visual properties in the "Changing the Visual Structure of a Control" section in [Customizing the Appearance of an Existing Control by Creating a ControlTemplate](../Topic/Customizing%20the%20Appearance%20of%20an%20Existing%20Control%20by%20Creating%20a%20ControlTemplate.md).
trans-unit.target: 您可以找到的視覺屬性清單中的 「 變更 Visual 結構的控制項 」 一節中[自訂現有控制項的外觀，藉由建立 ControlTemplate](../Topic/Customizing%20the%20Appearance%20of%20an%20Existing%20Control%20by%20Creating%20a%20ControlTemplate.md)。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Expander"></xref> class.
trans-unit.target: 初始化的新執行個體<xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Expander"></xref>類別。

trans-unit.source: Occurs when the content window of an <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Expander"></xref> control closes and only the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.HeaderedContentControl.Header*> is visible.
trans-unit.target: 發生時的內容視窗<xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Expander"></xref>控制關閉和 「 僅<xref:System.Windows.Controls.HeaderedContentControl.Header*>為可見。</xref:System.Windows.Controls.HeaderedContentControl.Header*>

trans-unit.source: The Collapsed event occurs when the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Expander.IsExpanded%2A> property changes from `true` to `false`.
trans-unit.target: 摺疊事件發生時<xref:System.Windows.Controls.Expander.IsExpanded%2A>屬性從變更`true`至`false`。</xref:System.Windows.Controls.Expander.IsExpanded%2A>

trans-unit.source: ## Routed Event Information ||| |-|-| |Identifier field|| |Routing strategy|Bubbling| |Delegate||
trans-unit.target: # # 路由事件資訊 | | | |-|-| |識別項欄位 || |路由策略 |反昇 | |委派 ||

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: 即將加入。

trans-unit.source: Identifies the <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Expander.Collapsed"></xref> routed event.
trans-unit.target: 識別<xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Expander.Collapsed"></xref>路由的事件。

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: 即將加入。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the direction in which the <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Expander"></xref> content window opens.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定在其中的方向<xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Expander"></xref>內容 視窗隨即開啟。

trans-unit.source: ## Dependency Property Information ||| |-|-| |Identifier field|| |Metadata properties set to `true`||
trans-unit.target: # # 相依性屬性資訊 | | | |-|-| |識別項欄位 || |中繼資料屬性設定為`true`||

trans-unit.source: One of the <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.ExpandDirection"></xref> values that defines which direction the content window opens.
trans-unit.target: 其中一個<xref href="System.Windows.Controls.ExpandDirection"></xref>定義的方向的值 [內容] 視窗隨即開啟。

trans-unit.source: The default is <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.ExpandDirection"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 預設值是<xref href="System.Windows.Controls.ExpandDirection"> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: Identifies the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Expander.ExpandDirection*> dependency property.
trans-unit.target: 識別<xref:System.Windows.Controls.Expander.ExpandDirection*>相依性屬性。</xref:System.Windows.Controls.Expander.ExpandDirection*>

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: 即將加入。

trans-unit.source: Occurs when the content window of an <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Expander"></xref> control opens to display both its header and content.
trans-unit.target: 發生時的內容視窗<xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Expander"></xref>控制隨即開啟，並顯示其標頭和內容。

trans-unit.source: The Expanded event occurs when the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Expander.IsExpanded%2A> property changes from `false` to `true`.
trans-unit.target: 擴充事件發生時<xref:System.Windows.Controls.Expander.IsExpanded%2A>屬性從變更`false`至`true`。</xref:System.Windows.Controls.Expander.IsExpanded%2A>

trans-unit.source: ## Routed Event Information ||| |-|-| |Identifier field|| |Routing strategy|Bubbling| |Delegate||
trans-unit.target: # # 路由事件資訊 | | | |-|-| |識別項欄位 || |路由策略 |反昇 | |委派 ||

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: 即將加入。

trans-unit.source: Identifies the <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Expander.Expanded"></xref> routed event.
trans-unit.target: 識別<xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Expander.Expanded"></xref>路由的事件。

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: 即將加入。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets whether the <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Expander"></xref> content window is visible.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定是否<xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Expander"></xref>內容的視窗為可見。

trans-unit.source: ## Dependency Property Information ||| |-|-| |Identifier field|| |Metadata properties set to `true`|, |
trans-unit.target: # # 相依性屬性資訊 | | | |-|-| |識別項欄位 || |中繼資料屬性設定為`true`|、 |

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the content window is expanded; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>如果已展開 [內容] 視窗。，否則， <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: The default is <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 預設值是<xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: Identifies the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Expander.IsExpanded*> dependency property.
trans-unit.target: 識別<xref:System.Windows.Controls.Expander.IsExpanded*>相依性屬性。</xref:System.Windows.Controls.Expander.IsExpanded*>

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: 即將加入。

trans-unit.source: Raises the <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Expander.Collapsed"></xref> event when the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Expander.IsExpanded*> property changes from <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> to <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 引發<xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Expander.Collapsed"></xref>事件時<xref:System.Windows.Controls.Expander.IsExpanded*>屬性從變更<xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>至<xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>。</xref:System.Windows.Controls.Expander.IsExpanded*>

trans-unit.source: Creates the implementation of <xref href="System.Windows.Automation.Peers.AutomationPeer"></xref> for the <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Expander"></xref> control.
trans-unit.target: 建立實作<xref href="System.Windows.Automation.Peers.AutomationPeer"></xref>如<xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Expander"></xref>控制項。

trans-unit.source: A new <xref href="System.Windows.Automation.Peers.ExpanderAutomationPeer"></xref> for this <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Expander"></xref> control.
trans-unit.target: 新<xref href="System.Windows.Automation.Peers.ExpanderAutomationPeer"></xref>這個<xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Expander"></xref>控制項。

trans-unit.source: Raises the <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Expander.Expanded"></xref> event when the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Expander.IsExpanded*> property changes from <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref> to <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 引發<xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Expander.Expanded"></xref>事件時<xref:System.Windows.Controls.Expander.IsExpanded*>屬性從變更<xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>至<xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""> </xref>。</xref:System.Windows.Controls.Expander.IsExpanded*>
